name: NSCollectionElementCategory
desc: Constants specifying the type of element in the collection view.

items.name: case item
items.desc: The element is an item. Items represent the main content of your collection view.

items.name: case supplementaryView
items.desc: The element is a supplementary view. Use supplementary views for single views that contain some data but are associated with an entire section. For example, use them to specify header or footer views for a section.

items.name: case decorationView
items.desc: The element is a decoration view. Decoration views represent visual adornments that do not contain any data of their own.

items.name: case interItemGap
items.desc: The element is an inter-item gap. An inter-item gap element is a custom visual indicator that is displayed between items when dropping items into the collection view.
